item.title: Free CA certification details process
item.description: Free CA Certificate Configuration install certbot yum install certbot Manual certificate-only installation certbot run -a manual -i nginx -d domain.com,www.domain.com Saving debug log to /var/log/letsencrypt/letsencrypt.log Requesting a certificate for www.domain.com - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Create a file containing just this data: I7Sl7-xakxMT9dCS67OrHmzn_tFiBx-64g58jlkj9FM.
